title: Legacy skins not on sale??
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/battle-boss-blitzcrank-sends-skins-hiding
it says big bad warwick, jaximus and rune wars renekton are on sale right now, but they arent?

replies.body:
Hey guys,

It should be up now, apologies for the delay
I bought Academy Vladimir and Academy Ahri on the 20th of August then came back online on Friday afternoon to find I couldn't use either of the skins anymore?

Hi ReV Timer,

The skins were released early by mistake for a very short amount of time. Since they are not yet ready for release we've had to reverse any purchases made. So you should have also received a refund for any Academy skins you purchased and were subsequently removed.
Correct, cmon riot, please adjust the prices, as its been over 9 hrs since the sale started and the skins are still at full price...{{item:3151}}
Sorry for the confusion. The sale wasn't scheduled to start until 5 PM but we'd listed it as starting at 7 AM, which is just when they were added back to the store.
